title: Validate Analytics Tracking Code Installation
description: After a new website launch, an analyst needs to verify that the Google Analytics tracking code is installed and firing correctly on all pages.

tasks.description: Use Google Tag Assistant or a similar browser extension to check the homepage for the GA tracking code.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tool shows the tag is present and firing correctly.

tasks.description: Navigate to several other key pages on the site (e.g., product page, contact page) and verify the tag is present on them as well.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the tag is installed site-wide.

tasks.description: Check the real-time report in Google Analytics to see if your own visit is being recorded.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees 1 active user in the real-time report, confirming data is being collected.
